title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost. The expected behavior is that a view that is maximized should stay maximized.
OB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Maximize the CVS repository view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Verify that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
